description: The sole survivor of an Ittou-ryuu massacre at Anotsu`s hand and heir to her father`s sword school, the "Mutenichi-ryuu". She has mediocre swordsmanship skills but an intense desire to avenge the brutal death of her family. At the beginning of the series is she portrayed as somebody who is trying to act mature, but is still very childish - as the series progresses she steadily "grows up" and loses much of her naivety. She hires Manji as her bodyguard in this quest.
name: Asano Rin
